‘niruwathin wedi wadina awasana pathuma thula niruwathini yudha anduma’ yam widihakin, kawiyage awasana pathuma el.ti.ti.eeye awasan prarthanawa samanga samapatha weyi nam, ewita, ema prathigami drushtiwadaya wisin wiplawiya prawanathamaya kalawak pilibanda kawiyage sundara apeksha sun karanu labanawa.

abhicharawidhi[sanskaranaya] jiwitha chakraya alala bandunu abhichara widhi pahatha dakwanu labe: pradhana yakku ho nayakku abhichara widhi adala wadi adahili kirikoraha kandeyaka/bilindiyaka/nayakku dadayam, mipani saha aswanu sandaha eethale natuma eethaleyaka/kandeyaka aarakshawa sandaha masyahana kandeyaka dadayam, pani, saha pujopahara washayen yakku ho dewiwaru hathme natuma ale/gale yakku daruwan laba ganimata/sashrikathwaya patta yaka pujawa patta yaka gabbara sthringe aarakshawa, roga niwaranaya kiriamma puja kiriammawaru daruwanta aarakshawa eethale natuma kande yaka aarakshawa dole yak pujawa doleyaka roga niwaranaya dammaduwa maralu yakku leda niwaranaya rahuyak pujawa rahuyaka pani aswanu, roga niwaranaya wanagathayak pujawa wanagatha yaka dadayam ha dadayam aarakshawa ruwala pujawa millaneyaka dadayam, mipani, aarakshawa, roga niwaranaya awanapujawa wadi yakku/idigolleyaka dadayam dimata pujopahara kolama maduwa aluth yaka/dewi dhanya, dadayam ha sashrikathwaya awasanyogika bahira yak-dewa wishwasa dammaduwa maralu yakku aswanu, niyanga ha dewaleda niwaranaya pena balima kiriamma (paththini)/ambaarapothi hadihuniyam, aarakshawa riri,kalu, kota,pulutu, odi yakku ha kali amma puja bhayankarayakku hadihuniyam, eki yakunge aarakshawa minneriya dewipuja minneriya dewi sashrikathwaya ha aarakshawa katharagama dewipuja katharagama dewi sashrithwaya ha aarakshawa galliri bandara dewipuja galliri bandara dewi sashrikathwaya ha aarakshawa awasanyogika bauddha/hindu pudapujawan mihidan kirima bauddha aakarayata malagiyawunta pin paminawima danadima bauddha danamana aakarayata malagiyagnyathinta pin paminawima mahiyangana perahata ekwima bauddha abhichara karadara wipathduru kirima katharagamyama ha peraharata ekwima hindu abhichara
